data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jiao, Kelong, Bu, Wenjun (2010): Notes on the genus Procystiphora Felt, 1915 (Diptera: Cecidomyiidae) with description of one new species inducing galls in branchlets of a bamboo in China. Zootaxa 2717: 53-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199750
